name: Popal
description:
Made for Colyseus + Unity Game Jam

Popal is a simple fast-paced 2D PvP shooter.

  • You can only shoot when you jump
  • If you deal damage, you heal by the same amount
  • You can jump off the walls

Controls:

  • W/S - Move left/right
  • Space - Jump
  • Space mid air - Shoot
  • LShift - Restart

Graphics, programming and audio by Anatoliy Titov.
